Gets the AuthClient instance for the Alchemy Auth connector.

**Advanced usage only.** For most use cases, use higher-level actions instead.

## Import

```ts
import { getAuthClient } from "@alchemy/wagmi-core";
```

## Parameters

### config

`Config`

- The shared Wagmi/Alchemy config

## Returns

`AuthClient`
The AuthClient instance
